name: Salomon QST Access Custom Heat Ski Boots - Women's
categories: QST Access Custom Heat Ski Boots
description: Heated floors, seat warmers or electric blankets have nothing on these heat-blasting all-mountain boots. The QST Access Cutom Heat Boots have rechargeable custom heat liners with 3 heat settings to keep your toes toasty on the lift. Flip to the lowest setting for 18 hours of warmth. All the trappings of solid freeride boots are here too: a solid polyurethane shell, hike or ride modes, a backbone release for easier walking, oversized pivot for power transfer, solid buckles and a 45mm power strap.Custom heat 3D liners provides 3 heat settings to keep your feet warm regardless of the outside temperature.At lowest heat setting, battery lasts up to 18 hours.Recharge port and  heat adjustment with a +/- button on the outside.Mono-material polyurethane shell, with polypropylene upper cuff.Hike and Ride technology for skiing or walking.Backbone release and a V-cut shape on back make hiking easier.Oversized pivot reduces play for precision and direct transmission.Ratchet buckle, 2 aluminum buckles and a 45mm power strap.
